Title: Uba Sani preaches unity at Kaduna’s Christmas carol
Summary: Kaduna State Governor, Uba Sani, has called for unity among citizens . Governor Sani attended this year’s carol organised by the Christian Association of Nigeria (CAN) in collaboration with the Kaduna state Government .

Title: PRP calls on NASS to impeach Tinubu if implicated in tax law breach
Summary: PRP calls on NASS to impeach Tinubu if implicated in tax law breach . The Peoples Redemption Party (PRP) has called on the National Assembly to initiate impeachment proceedings .

Title: SEEDAN lauds Tinubu over N50b seed industry catalytic fund
Summary: SEEDAN lauds Tinubu over N50b seed industry catalytic fund . The Seed Entrepreneurs Association of Nigeria (SEEDAN) has commended the disbursement of the N50 billion Seed Industry Catalytic Fund .

Title: ABUAD multi-system hospital reversing medical tourism – Management
Summary: Management of Afe Babalola Multi System Hospital, Ado-Ekiti said it has started reversing medical tourism of notable Nigerians abroad . Patients now come from overseas for medical care at the hospital . Completes 40 kidney transplant surgeries .

Title: Ogun govt signs MoU with investor to take over Olumorock tourism centre
Summary: Ogun govt signs MoU with investor to take over Olumorock tourism centre . The state government has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with a private organisation to advance the state’s tourism potential .

Title: Man City players face Christmas weigh-in as Guardiola issues ‘fatty’ warning
Summary: Guardiola issues 'fatty' warning to his players ahead of Christmas weigh-in . Guardiola: "They can eat but I want to control them." The City boss says he wants to see how they come back after three days .

Title: Iran says missile programme defensive, non-negotiable
Summary: Iran says missile programme defensive, non-negotiable . Iran's defense capabilities, designed to deter aggressors from attacking Iran, are not a matter of talk .

Title: Court grants FG’s plea to reopen terrorism case against suspects linked to Bello Turji
Summary: Federal High Court granted application filed by the Federal Government to reopen a terrorism charge filed against five suspects linked to Bello Turji . Five suspects were linked to the notorious terrorist kingpin, Bello . The application was filed in a bid to reopen the case against the suspects .

Title: Liverpool fear Isak has broken leg – Reports
Summary: The Sweden forward was hurt in the act of scoring the opening goal in Saturday's 2-1 victory in London . He was hurt after a sliding challenge from Spurs defender Micky van der Ven .

Title: Troops arrest bandit leader in Benue
Summary: The arrest is described as a major operational breakthrough for the army . A statement on Monday by Lt. Umar Muhammad, Acting Assistant Director, Army Public Relations of the Brigade, described the arrest as a 'major operational breakthrough'
